item.title: Welcome on board
item.description: Today the Putnami Web Toolkit alias PWT is out of the box! First public announcement has been done on the GWT google group. We really hope that we're gonna enjoy :)
item.author: Fabien

item.title: What's up! 2 weeks from our first and only public post.
item.description: Lots of people come and come back. we talked about our toolkit and close to 50 countries came to see it. Internet is truly magical. All the feedback are hopeful. Now we know that we've got something with great future.
item.author: Fabien

item.title: 1.0.0-RC2 has been released.
item.description: Waoh! every things is going right. 8 new enhancements, 6 fixed issues, The sun is shining for PWT. The 1.0 final is planed for the end of august.
item.author: Fabien
